channel.title: How can i add more waves -> Jad

item.title: How can i add more waves -> Jad
item.dc:creator: @James-RevolutionX James-RevolutionX
item.description:
@James-RevolutionX wrote:

I have 7 waves of jad minigames but I want 63, can someone give me the list, this is what I got at the moment:

Useing Devolution Base

public void SpawnNewWave()
{
    if(TzWave == 1)
    {
        server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2627, 2380, 5105, heightLevel); //Level 22, Proudly recoded by James.
        NeededKills = 1;
    } 
    if(TzWave == 2)
    {
        server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2627, 2379, 5070, heightLevel); //Level 22, Proudly recoded by James.
        server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2630, 2382, 5107, heightLevel); //Level 45, Proudly recoded by James.
        NeededKills = 5;
    } 
    if(TzWave == 3)
    {
        server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2627, 2381, 5104, heightLevel); //Level 22, Proudly recoded by James.
        server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2630, 2379, 5070, heightLevel); //Level 45, Proudly recoded by James.
        server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2631, 2390, 5069, heightLevel); //Level 90, Proudly recoded by James.
    NeededKills = 10;
    } 
    if(TzWave == 4)
    {
        server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2627, 2381, 5104, heightLevel); //Level 22, Proudly recoded by James.
        server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2630, 2379, 5070, heightLevel); //Level 45, Proudly recoded by James.
        server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2631, 2390, 5069, heightLevel); //Level 90, Proudly recoded by James.
        server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2741, 2382, 5107, heightLevel); //Level 180, Proudly recoded by James.
    NeededKills = 16;
    } 
    if(TzWave == 5)
    {
        server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2627, 2381, 5104, heightLevel); //Level 22, Proudly recoded by James.
        server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2630, 2379, 5070, heightLevel); //Level 45, Proudly recoded by James.
        server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2631, 2390, 5069, heightLevel); //Level 90, Proudly recoded by James.
        server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2741, 2382, 5107, heightLevel); //Level 180, Proudly recoded by James.
        server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2743, 2383, 5069, heightLevel); //Level 360, Proudly recoded by James.
    NeededKills = 23;
    } 
    if(TzWave == 6)
    {
        talk("Get ready, TzTok-Jad will spawn after this wave!", 2619);
        server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2743, 2406, 5071, heightLevel); //Level 360, Proudly recoded by James.
        server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2743, 2383, 5069, heightLevel); //Level 360, Proudly recoded by James.
        NeededKills = 25;
    } 
    if(TzWave == 7)
    {
        talk("Look out, here comes TzTok-Jad!", 2617);
        server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2745, 2400, 5083, heightLevel); //Level 702, Proudly recoded by James.
        NeededKills = 26;
    } 
}

Regards James
